pattern: what is online banking,who can use this features,what can I do with Online banking,Online banking means?,Purpose of online banking
responses: Online Banking is a tool that allows you to use a personal computer with an Internet connection to conduct your banking online,All individual customers are used this features,You can view account balances and transaction history, and transfer money between CSB accounts. You can also sign up for free Online Bill Payment that allows you to pay your bills quickly and easily!! :)

pattern: can I pay bills through the mobile app?,whtat are the procedures?,If I some details orelse whatever ,can I do any changes?,Is it need ,if we have already using bill pay?,How do I create a new payee,can I expedit a payment?
responses: yes,but paying your bills has never been easier,you will need to setup bill pay through your online banking.if it has not been setup you will get an error from our app that states , SSN s invalid for consumer .once bill pay s established through online banking you have to go back to it,you can DD,change or remove payees by selecting pay bills from the landing page or the hamburger menu,There is  no need to set anything up,select pay bills & click add a payee,No,be sure to review the delivery dater when asking your payment through our mobile app to make sure your payment will active on time

pattern: what is an External Transfer?,how  can I send an External Transfer from the mobile app?,how much money can I send with External transfer?
responses: It allows you to request money from your account at another institution to your first savings bank account or to send money from your account at first savings bank to your account at another institution.you can also add or remove accounts,view transfer history & cancel PENDING transfers.if you select standard processing this is completed at NO cost to you!for express transfers here is a $5.00 per transaction fees,select External transfer from the landing page or the humburger menu and select Schedule transfer,you can send my amount between $50.00 & $1,000.00 per transaction for a max of 3 transaction per day, totalling up to $3,000.00.There can be a total of 5 transaction per week, totalling up to $5,000.00.

pattern: what is pay a friend?,How do I pay  friend from the mobile app?,How much I money can I send or receive from a friend at a time?
responses: pay a friend within our mobile app allows you to send or request money from another person,no matter where they live or what financial institution they use(as long as it is within the United States).All you need is their mobile phone number or email address.You can also add or remove friends,view transfer history & cancel PENDING transfers.All of this is at NO cost to you!,Select pay a friend from the landing page or the hamburger menu and select New payment/Send money or Request money,With pay friend you can send or request any amount between $10.00& $500.00 per transaction for max f 5 transactions per Day, totalling up to there can be a total of no more than $1,000.00 per week.
